goal.en: “In this course, students can acquire a firm understanding of electrodynamics concepts, abstract from nature to build mathematical models, find exact or approximate solutions to those mathematical models, and broaden, deepen, and sharpen their physical and mathematical problem solving skills.“
goal.ch: 在這門課，學生可以學習到電動力學的基本觀念，如何從自然觀察抽象化為數學模型，學習數學分析方法，以及深化他們解決物理與數學問題的技巧與能力。

content.en:
“
1. Ｍaxwell Equations
2. Plane Electromagnetic Waves and Wave Propagation
3. Waveguides and Resonant Cavities
4. Radiating Systems, Multipole Fields and Radiation
5. Scattering and Diffraction
6. Special Theory ofRelativity
“
content.ch:
“
1. 馬克思威爾方程式
2. 平面電磁波與波的傳遞
3. 波導
4. 電磁輻射系統
5. 電磁波的散射與繞射
6. 狹義相對論
“

textbook.en:
“
1. J. D. Jackson, Classical Electrodynamics (3rd Ed.), John Wiley ＆ Sons, 1999.
2. Marion ＆ Heald, “Classical Electromagnetic Radiation”, 3rd Ed.
3. G. B. Arfken and H. J. Weber, Mathematics Methods for Physicists (7th Ed.), Academic Press, 2013.
“
